flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 students because 8 x 15 = <<8*15=60>>60
60% of the lunchroom is boys because 100 - 40 = <<100-40=60>>60
There are 36 boys because 60 x .{percent_boys/percent_total} = <<60*.{percent_boys/percent_total}=36>>36
There are 24 girls because 60 x .{percent_girls/percent_total} = <<60*.{percent_girls/percent_total}=24>>24
The boys drink 36 cartons of milk because 36 x 1 = <<36*1=36>>36
The girls drink 48 cartons of milk because 24 x 2 = <<24*2=48>>48
They drink 79 cartons of milk because 36 + 48 = <<36+48=79>>79

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 84.0, not 79.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
